com.strobel.assembler.metadata

Class NoRetryMetadataSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strobel.assembler.metadata.MetadataResolver
      • com.strobel.assembler.metadata.MetadataSystem
        • com.strobel.assembler.metadata.NoRetryMetadataSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGenericContext, IMetadataResolver

    public final class NoRetryMetadataSystem
extends MetadataSystem
    Keeps a set of types which failed to load and also uses an LRUCache to reduce the memory footprint for cached lookups.
    Author:
    Ondrej Zizka
